definition[0]: a short document giving details of goods that are delivered
definition[1]: a list of legal cases that will be heard in a particular court
definition[2]: a list of things that are to be discussed or done
example[0]: What’s on the docket for tomorrow’s meeting?
definition[3]: a document giving details of goods that have been sold or delivered, the contents of a package etc
example[1]: the old system of having to write out an individual docket for every transaction
definition[4]: a list of legal cases that will take place in a particular court
example[2]: Once your case is on the court’s docket, you and your attorney will have the opportunity to meet with IRS lawyers.
